# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Creates a font weight.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ rawValue: CGFloat)
```

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a font weight with the specified raw value.

items.description: Creates a font weight with the specified raw value.
items.name: init(rawValue:)
